D

d_btnSize - Variable in class clueClient.GUI
size constant for a JButton component
d_cardSize - Variable in class clueClient.GUI
size constant for a card graphic
d_cellSize - Variable in class clueClient.GUI
size constant for a board cell graphic
debugMode - Variable in class clueServer.Server
flag variable for turning on debugging output
Deck - Variable in class clueServer.Cards
contains the cards held by which player (the first index number, 7 is held cards)
defaultPort - Static variable in class utils.Utilities
This is the unified access point for the commonly used default port number, if it has to be changed, this means we only need to change it in one place.
Dice - Class in clueServer
Class semantics and roles:
The Dice has only one purpose, to act as a traditional 6 sided die for game play by creating a random number between 1 and 6

Information maintenance:
Creation: Dice is created during start up by GameLogic
Deletion: Dice is deleted when the game ends or otherwise terminates
Dice() - Constructor for class clueServer.Dice
Constructor: initializes the random number generator
Parameters: none
DiceTest - Class in testPages
Purpose: Test the functionality of the Dice object
DiceTest() - Constructor for class testPages.DiceTest
 
Die - Variable in class clueServer.GameLogic
a die
Display - Variable in class clueServer.GameBoard
a String model of the board
Disprover - Variable in class clueServer.GameLogic.GuessReturn
an integer representation of the person who disproved the player
Doorways - Variable in class clueServer.GameBoard
array of positions for door ways
draw() - Method in class clueClient.GUI
Purpose: Draw game board components on the screen

Precondition: There is a 'damaged' version of the game display on the user's screen
Postcondition: There is an updated / current version of the game display on the user's screen
Pseudo-Code:
BEGIN
- add the BoardModel cell objects into the frame - validate all frame's sub components
- pack the GUI object's JFrame instance
- set the GUI object's JFrame instance's visibility to true
END
